TopicTitle: Cannot restore a save during Munar 1 Mission

Articles.Content:
Is it normal that I cannot restore a previous save during the Munar 1 mission?

This image is from right after I crashed again, but even before crashing, I could not go back to a previous save.

I keep crashing on launching from the Mun, and can't restore from my in-orbit quick save.

I can save the game as much as I like, but there is no load button.

I"m pretty sure I was able to save and restore during some of the other Making History missions. But not this one.

I am puzzled. Thanks for any clues.

 

Edited May 24, 2020 by FloppyRocket
Corrected a typo
I just tested this and it looks like that's intentional.
